title: Why are the 7 wonders of the world? - Quora

response.answer_text: “why”? Are you asking for the reason they were named wonders? The (ancient) Seven Wonders of the World were essentially a list of things that a traveller “must see” in the ancient world. The list was redacted by Greeks around the third century BC. The 7 Wonders were: Hanging Gardens of Babylon Cheope’s Pyramid Pharos’ island Colossus of Rhodes Artemis’ temple at Ephesus Phidia’s statue of Zeus in Olympia Mausoleum of Halicarnassus
